properties.Name: DWQ Stormwater
properties.Description: New storm sewer across Pimlico Parkway
properties.Impacts: Open cut across Pimlico Parkway to construction of new storm sewer. Other underground utilities in ROW may need to be relocated to avoid conflicts. Utility companies to be provided plans. Plan carry over from Summer 2015.

properties.Name: Division of Water Quality Gravity Sanitary Sewer
properties.Description: Construction of approximately 1,100-LF of 12-IN gravity sanitary sewer in the vicinity of the University of Kentucky Track and Marquis Avenue. The proposed gravity sewer will replace existing sanitary sewer infrastructure.
properties.Impacts: Construction will involve conventional open trench excavation for sewer line replacement and sewer service re-connection on Marquis Avenue.

properties.Name: DWQ Storm Water
properties.Description: New stormwater inlets and pipe in Laramie Dr. Channel regarding and bank stabilization behind homes on Larmie and between 672 & 674 Sheridan.
properties.Impacts: Roadway is to be open cut between 641 Laramie and 2356 Harrodsburg Road. Disturbed pavement will be milled and repaired curb to curb. Water and gas have been relocated to eliminate conflicts. Proposed storm sewer will cross over the existing sanitary sewer. Project is a carry over from Spring/Summer 2015.

properties.Name: DWQ Stormwater
properties.Description:
New stormsewer system on Rogers Road, Kent Dr, Shandon Dr. 
Rogers Road between Mary Todd Park and 634 Rogers Road. 613 Kent Dr. to Cabot. 
This project is a carry over from "mid 2014."
properties.Impacts: Cutting and trenching in pavement, removal/ replacement of curb and sidewalk. Full width pavement restoration. May have conflicts with other underground utilities-- water, gas, sanitary sewer.

properties.Name: DWQ-Stormwater
properties.Description: New culvert under Wilson Downing Rd between Ridgepoint Run and Allante Brook
properties.Impacts: Major disturbance. Roadway to be completely rebuilt with new culvert. Major impact to utilities, requiring relocations. Major impact to Wilson Downing Rd.

properties.Name: DWQ-Stormwater
properties.Description: New storm sewer pipe connected to curb box inlet 2548 Cashel Ct.
properties.Impacts: Removal/replacement of sidewalk. Removal/replacement of curb and gutter. Minor pavement removal/replacement

properties.Name: DWQ-Stormwater
properties.Description: New surface inlet, storm sewer, & headwall to improve drainage on Higbee Mill Road.
properties.Impacts: Excavation outside of pavement for new inlet and headwall. Trench excavation for pipe across Higbee Mill. Water and gas are present and may need to be relocated to resolve conflict. Pavement will be cut and restored.

properties.Name: DWQ-Stormwater
properties.Description: Construct new curb and gutter along Hunters Wood near 2112.
properties.Impacts: Minimal disturbance to pavement for construction of curb & gutter. Minimal impact to utilities or city infastructure

properties.Name: DWQ- Stormwater
properties.Description: New inlet and storm pipe at the intersection of Fincastle and McDowell.
properties.Impacts: Curb on south side of intersection and pavement along McDowell. Sanitary Sewer crossing, possible underground utilities along alignment. Curb and pavement.

properties.Name: DWQ- Stormwater
properties.Description: New inlet and storm pipe at the intersection of Fincastle and McDowell.
properties.Impacts: Curb on south side of intersection and pavement along McDowell. Sanitary Sewer crossing, possible underground utilities along alignment. Curb and pavement.

properties.Description: Upsize trunk sewers-2,344 linear feet of 27 inch to 36 inch diameter from TB1_5077 to TB2_17.
properties.Impacts: Construction will cross Manchester, Perry, Edmond, Willard, Valley, High, and Neville.
